EmailTemplate.subject: Happy Work Anniversary {!Contact.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
We are thrilled to celebrate your work anniversary with us! Your passion, commitment, and hard work have been a significant asset to our company. We appreciate your valuable contributions and the positive impact that you have made on our team and projects.
We look forward to working together for many more years to come. Congratulations on reaching this important milestone in your career!
Regards,
The Cloud Peritus Team
